div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1778 Baghdad environs, Mesopotamia, 1954 Burial: c. 136 B.C. (M) Contents: 212 AR Antiochus IV: 30 tetradr. (Antiocheia 28, Ace 2) Antiochus V: 10 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius I: 85 tetradr. (Antiocheia 83, Ace 2) Alexander I Bala: 13 tetradr. (Antiocheia 12, Sidon 1) Antiochus VII: 3 tetradr. (Antiocheia as SMA 279, 281, 282) Aradus: 71 dr. (to yr. 106 = 154/3 B.C.) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
